[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”4.4.1″][et_pb_fullwidth_header title=”get in touch” module_class=”page-hero-template” _builder_version=”4.4.1″ title_font=”|700||on|||||” title_text_align=”center” title_text_color=”#29295b” title_font_size=”40px” content_text_align=”center” content_text_color=”#777e84″ content_font_size=”19px” subhead_text_align=”center” subhead_text_color=”#777e84″ subhead_font_size=”15px” background_enable_color=”off” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”rgba(255,255,255,0)” background_color_gradient_end=”#ffffff” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_image=”https://clinlabstaffing.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/home.jpg” background_position=”top_center” custom_padding=”165px||165px||true|false” title_font_size_tablet=”” title_font_size_phone=”30px” title_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop”]Start filling your open life science positions, call us today: 508.907.6222[/et_pb_fullwidth_header][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.4.1″ background_enable_color=”off” custom_margin=”0px||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||10px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”||29px||false|false”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_4,1_4,1_4″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″][et_pb_blurb title=”Headquarters:” url_new_window=”on” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%270%%” icon_color=”#29295b” use_icon_font_size=”on” icon_font_size=”20px” _builder_version=”4.4.1″ header_font=”|700|||||||” header_text_align=”center” text_orientation=”center” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” link_option_url_new_window=”on” title__hover_enabled=”off|desktop”]

Watertown, MA 02472

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″][et_pb_blurb title=”Phone Number:” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%264%%” icon_color=”#29295b” use_icon_font_size=”on” icon_font_size=”20px” _builder_version=”4.4.1″ header_font=”|700|||||||” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false”]508.907.6222[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″][et_pb_blurb title=”Fax Number:” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%268%%” icon_color=”#29295b” use_icon_font_size=”on” icon_font_size=”20px” _builder_version=”4.4.1″ header_font=”|700|||||||” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false”]508.907.6263[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″][et_pb_blurb title=”Email Address:” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%109%%” icon_color=”#29295b” use_icon_font_size=”on” icon_font_size=”20px” _builder_version=”4.4.1″ header_font=”|700|||||||” header_text_align=”center” text_orientation=”center”]info@clinlabstaffing.com[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″ background_color=”#e9edee”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.4.1″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.1″ text_font=”|700||on|||||” text_text_color=”#29295b” text_font_size=”24px” text_orientation=”center” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”15px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_line_height_tablet=”” text_line_height_phone=”1.8em” text_line_height_last_edited=”on|tablet”]Tell us more about your staffing needs:[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.1″ text_text_color=”#777e84″ text_orientation=”center”]

(*) Are required

meta._et_pb_old_content:
Thank you for your interest in ClinLab Staffing.

Companies please use the form below or call 508.907.6222.

Candidates please follow instructions here - candidate inquires sent through this page will be marked as SPAM.

Mailing address:

321 Commonwealth Rd.
Suite 203
Wayland, MA 01778
T: 508.907.6222
F: 508.907.6263
E: info@clinlabstaffing.com
Directions

[gravityform id="1" name="Contact Us" title="false" description="false"]
